name: La ilaha illallah
translation: There is no deity but Allah

name: Hasbunallahu wa ni'mal wakeel
translation: Allah is Sufficient for us, and He is the Best Disposer of affairs

name: Rabbana atina fid dunya hasanatan wa fil akhirati hasanatan waqina azab an-nar
arabic: ربنا آتنا في الدنيا حسنة وفي الآخرة حسنة وقنا عذاب النار
translation: Our Lord, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter and protect us from the punishment of the Fire

name: SubhanAllahi wa bihamdiHi SubhanAllahil Azim
arabic: سبحان الله وبحمده سبحان الله العظيم
translation: Glory be to Allah and praise Him, Glory be to Allah the Most Great

name: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
translation: There is no power nor strength except with Allah
